changeSet.author: roman
changeSet.sql: create database if not exists sensors;

changeSet.author: Roman Zhovnerik
changeSet.sql: create table if not exists sensors.sensors_data ( id int not null primary key, sensors_name varchar(250) not null, sensors_model varchar(250) not null, sensors_type varchar(250) not null, sensors_range_from int, sensors_range_to int, sensors_unit varchar(250) not null, sensors_location varchar(100), sensors_descriptions varchar(1000), );

changeSet.author: Roman Zhovnerik
